alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Malibu Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Susana Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Western San Fernando Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 04 at 8:20PM PST until January 05 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...North winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 to 55 mph. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Central Ventura County Valleys, Malibu Coast, Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area, Western San Fernando Valley, Southeastern Ventura County Valleys and Santa Susana Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Roadways may be affected by gusty cross winds, including Highways 23, 33, 101, 118, 126, and 150. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Ventura County Valleys; Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Malibu Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Susana Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Western San Fernando Valley
